New Records: Donovan Mitchell shot 18% from the floor, with 11 points
Jarrett Allen finished the night with 25 points, 6 assists
Key Match Events: A late fourth quarter run cut the Cavaliers' lead to two with about 1:30 to play
A Jarrett Allen tip-out on an Evan Mobley missed three seemed to seal the game for the Cavaliers after a long review
Post-Match Reflections: The Cavaliers have passed every possible test to this point in the season
The team has proven to be legit and not just a cosmic fluke
The players around the best player raised their games in support, showing a mark of a great team
Miscellaneous Highlights: The two teams combined for 259 points
The game was a heavyweight fight of NBA Goliaths, and small market teams vying for national respect
The Cavaliers are now 32-4 on the season
Others: Shea Gilgeous-Alexander looked as smooth as always, pouring in 31 points for the Thunder
